page.para: All the things I want to be
What do I want to be when I grow up?
When I grow up, I want to be a chef and make food for my fam/i/ly and friends.
When I grow up, I want to be a foot/ball play/er and score the win/ning goal.
When I grow up, I want to be a doc/tor and make sick peo/ple bet/ter.
When I grow up, I want to be a mu/si/cian and play in a band.
When I grow up, I want to be a me/chan/ic and fix cars and trac/tors.
When I grow up, I want to be an as/tro/naut and fly to the moon.
Now tell me all the things you want to be!
